</div><div class="info"><div class="info-wrap"><p class="heading"><a class="title accent-hover" href="reviews/nintendo-switch/ash_of_gods_redemption"><span class="category accent">Review</span> <span class="title accent-hover">Ash of Gods: Redemption - A Gorgeous Turn-Based RPG Failure</span></a></p>

</div></div></div></li><li class="item item-content item-article item-medium" data-type="article" data-subject="news/2020/02/ninterview_how_two_gamesmaster_fans_are_paying_tribute_to_tvs_best_video_game_show"><div class="item-wrap"><div class="image"><a class="img" href="news/2020/02/ninterview_how_two_gamesmaster_fans_are_paying_tribute_to_tvs_best_video_game_show"><img src="http://images.nintendolife.com/fd3e513b99b6a/250x183.jpg" width="250" height="183" alt="" /></a><p class="user-comments"><a title="25 comments" href="news/2020/02/ninterview_how_two_gamesmaster_fans_are_paying_tribute_to_tvs_best_video_game_show#comments"><span class="icon icon-comments"></span> 25</a></p>
</div><div class="info"><div class="info-wrap"><p class="heading"><a class="title accent-hover" href="news/2020/02/ninterview_how_two_gamesmaster_fans_are_paying_tribute_to_tvs_best_video_game_show"><span class="category accent">Ninterview</span> <span class="title accent-hover">How Two GamesMaster Fans Are Paying Tribute To TV's Best Video Game Show</span></a></p>
<p class="description">Tune into "Under Consoletation"</p><p class="text">These days, you need only turn on your phone or open up a laptop to gain access to video game news, reviews and footage, but back in the pre-internet early '90s, you either had magazines or GamesMaster. For those of you outside the UK, that name might 
6a55
not mean anything, but trust us, it was amazing. GamesMaster was a...</p><ul class="list"><li class=" first"><span class="icon icon-time"></span> <time class="date age " datetime="2020-02-09T14:00:00+00:00"><span>2 days ago</span></time></li><li>Ninterview</li><li>Features</li><li>Retro</li><li class=" last">GamesMaster</li></ul>
</div></div></div></li><li class="item item-content item-article item-medium" data-type="article" data-subject="news/2020/02/good_smile_reveals_new_video_game_themed_nendoroid_and_figma_at_wonder_festival_2020"><div class="item-wrap"><div class="image"><a class="img" href="news/2020/02/good_smile_reveals_new_video_game_themed_nendoroid_and_figma_at_wonder_festival_2020"><img src="http://images.nintendolife.com/44a87da93d924/250x183.jpg" width="250" height="183" alt="" /></a><p class="user-comments"><a title="26 comments" href="news/2020/02/good_smile_reveals_new_video_game_themed_nendoroid_and_figma_at_wonder_festival_2020#comments"><span class="icon icon-comments"></span> 26</a></p>
</div><div class="info"><div class="info-wrap"><p class="heading"><a class="title accent-hover" href="news/2020/02/good_smile_reveals_new_video_game_themed_nendoroid_and_figma_at_wonder_festival_2020"><span class="category accent">News</span> <span class="title accent-hover">Good Smile Reveals New Video Game Themed Nendoroid And Figma At Wonder Festival 2020</span></a></p>
<p class="description">Splatoon, Bayonetta and much more</p><p class="text">This weekend Wonder Festival 2020 (Winter) is taking place in Chiba prefecture, Japan. To celebrate this event, the Good Smile Company has revealed its upcoming line of Figmas and Nendoroids. As usual, there is a wide range of video game themed ones. Some of these include Bayonetta, Pearl and Marina Figmas (Splatoon...</p><ul class="list"><li class=" first"><span class="icon icon-time"></span> <time class="date age " datetime="2020-02-09T09:00:00+00:00"><span>2 days ago</span></time></li><li>Merchandise</li><li>Good Smile Company</li><li class=" last">Nendoroid</li></ul>
</div></div></div></li><li class="item item-content item-article item-medium" data-type="article" data-subject="news/2020/02/bandai_namco_is_adding_a_new_z_assist_select_feature_to_dragon_ball_fighterz"><div class="item-wrap"><div class="image"><a class="img" href="news/2020/02/bandai_namco_is_adding_a_new_z_assist_select_feature_to_dragon_ball_fighterz"><img src="http://images.nintendolife.com/0dbcf0dab6543/250x183.jpg" width="250" height="183" alt="" /></a><p class="user-comments"><a title="9 comments" href="news/2020/02/bandai_namco_is_adding_a_new_z_assist_select_feature_to_dragon_ball_fighterz#comments"><span class="icon icon-comments"></span> 9</a></p>
</div><div class="info"><div class="info-wrap"><p class="heading"><a class="title accent-hover" href="news/2020/02/bandai_namco_is_adding_a_new_z_assist_select_feature_to_dragon_ball_fighterz"><span class="category accent">News</span> <span class="title accent-hover">Bandai Namco Is Adding A New "Z Assist Select" Feature To Dragon Ball FighterZ</span></a></p>
<p class="description">And aims to prevent one-sided matches</p><p class="text">Dragon Ball FighterZ is easily one of the best-supported fighting games available. Since it was released in 2018, Bandai Namco and Arc System Works have released two seasons worth of fighters and rolled out new updates on a regular basis. 
If you thought that was it, though, think again. At the Dragon Ball...</p><ul class="list"><li class=" first"><span class="icon icon-time"></span> <time class="date age " datetime="2020-02-09T05:30:00+00:00"><span>2 days ago</span></time></li><li>Nintendo Switch</li><li>Dragon Ball</li><li class=" last">Bandai Namco</li></ul>
</div></div></div></li><li class="item item-content item-article item-medium" data-type="article" data-subject="news/2020/02/poll_box_art_brawl_29_-_international_superstar_soccer_64"><div class="item-wrap"><div class="image"><a class="img" href="news/2020/02/poll_box_art_brawl_29_-_international_superstar_soccer_64"><img src="http://images.nintendolife.com/1ca4258bbcb37/250x183.jpg" width="250" height="183" alt="" /></a><p class="user-comments"><a title="50 comments" href="news/2020/02/poll_box_art_brawl_29_-_international_superstar_soccer_64#comments"><span class="icon icon-comments"></span> 50</a></p>
</div><div class="info"><div class="info-wrap"><p class="heading"><a class="title accent-hover" href="news/2020/02/poll_box_art_brawl_29_-_international_superstar_soccer_64"><span class="category accent">Poll</span> <span class="title accent-hover">Box Art Brawl #29 - International Superstar Soccer 64</span></a></p>
<p class="description">Fresh blood is coming in</p><p class="text">Welcome back to Box Art Brawl, the series where we throw a rosette and a bunch of regional box art variants into a pit and see which one emerges victorious with the bloodied prize pinned to its chest. 
Last week we watched as Mario Bros. battled for your amusement and pleasure. In a shocking turn of events, the sneaky...</p><ul class="list"><li class=" first"><span class="icon icon-time"></span> <time class="date age " datetime="2020-02-09T11:00:00+00:00"><span>2 days ago</span></time></li><li>Poll</li><li>Box Art Brawl</li><li>Retro</li><li class=" last">Football</li></ul>

<p class="description">Can you escape a castle without a body of your own?</p>
<ul class="list"><li class=" first"><span class="icon icon-time"></span> <time class="date age " datetime="2020-02-04T14:00:00+00:00"><span>7 days ago</span></time></li><li>Reviews</li><li>Switch eShop</li><li class=" last">Prison Princess</li></ul>
</div></div></div></li><li class="item item-content item-review" data-type="review" data-subject="reviews/switch-eshop/198x"><div class="item-wrap"><div class="cover"><a class="img" href="reviews/switch-eshop/198x"><img class="lazy" src="http://static.nintendolife.com/blank.gif" width="250" height="250" data-original="http://images.nintendolife.com/4f3c5f5bc2424/cover_250x250.jpg" alt="" /></a></div><div class="info"><div class="info-wrap"><p class="heading"><a class="title accent-hover" href="reviews/switch-eshop/198x"><span class="title accent-hover">198X - A Fabulous, If Fleeting, Celebration Of Arcade Gaming's Golden Era</span></a></p>
<p class="description">Short, but definitely sweet</p>
<ul class="list"><li class=" first"><span class="icon icon-time"></span> <time class="date age " datetime="2020-01-20T16:00:00+00:00"><span>Mon 20th Jan 2020</span></time></li><li>Reviews</li><li>Switch eShop</li><li class=" last">198X</li></ul>
</div></div></div></li></ul></div></section>
	</div>
<footer><p class="more"><a href="reviews">More Reviews</a></p>
</footer>
</section><!-- End Widget --><div class="insert block centered with-label lazyload for-desktop lazyload"><div id="u5e422a79ea450" data-ghost-zone="" data-dfp-id="NL_MID_X" data-dfp-sizes="728x90,970x250,960x250" class="lazyload"></div>
</div></div>
	<div class="clear"></div>

		// If user logged-in, do this...
		if (dgpConfig && dgpConfig["user"].user !== false) {
			window._sp_.mms.setTargeting("logged-in","true");

		}

			window._sp_.mms.setTargeting("logged-in","false");

		window._sp_.mms.startMsg();

										<span class="overlay"></span>

									<div class="content-wrap">
										<span class="triangle top-left"></span>
										<span class="triangle bottom-right"></span>
										<div class="content">
																						<h3><a href="http://www.desafiomundial.com/el-accidente-de-kobe-bryant-que-ha-sacudido-al-mundo/?view-all"><span>El Accidente De Kobe Bryant Que Ha Sacudido Al Mundo</span></a></h3>
																							<a class="excerpt" href="http://www.desafiomundial.com/el-accidente-de-kobe-bryant-que-ha-sacudido-al-mundo/?view-all">
													A fines de enero el mundo del deporte sufrió una de las pérdidas más importantes que tendrá en el 2020. La estrella del básquetbol Kobe Bryant dejó de existir luego de que su helicóptero privado se estrellara&hellip;												</a>

									</div>

    <div class="education" id="education">
        <div class="m-title clearfix">
            <h5 class="name">Ѷ</h5>
            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="more jyzxmore"></a>
            <div class="option" id="jyzx">
                <a href="javascript:void(0);" data-id="40" class="active">߿</a>
                <a href="javascript:void(0);" data-id="41">п</a>

                <a href="javascript:void(0);" data-id="31">ѧ</a>

        <div class="m-title clearfix">

            <span class="tip">
